q: Mirafiori vote had implications far beyond the limits of Turin. Business leaders say a decision by Mr Sergio Marchionne not to invest in Italy would have had devastating effect on already low foreign direct investment in Italy. Turnout was very high because people know this is a vote about the future of Italy, said Eros Panicali, secretary-general of the Uil union movement which had backed Mr Sergio Marchionne 's plan. The Mirafiori deal is part of Mr Sergio Marchionne 's`` Fabbrica Italia'' plan to invest â¬ 20bn in Fiat
